message.entry: Specifying a polynomial sweep vector as the second input argument will not be supported in future releases.
The {0} mode is not defined for the {1} sweep method.
Instantaneous frequency at time 0 must be greater than or equal to 1e-6 for a logarithmic sweep.
Polynomial method not supported for code generation.
Output complexity must be specified only once.
Sweep method must be specified only once.
Spectrogram shape of quadratic chirp must be specified only once.
For code generation, optional string or character vector inputs must be compile-time constants.
